TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes extends System.Object
public ref class ServiceModelSecurityTokenTypes abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示由 WCF 识别的安全令牌类型。

span.span: Represents the types of security tokens recognized by WCF.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 和 将使用此类型的静态字符串来识别令牌提供程序和令牌身份验证器，从而根据令牌类型来进行创建。The static strings in this type are used by the and to identify token providers and token authenticators to create based on the token type.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property AnonymousSslnego As String
public: static property System::String ^ AnonymousSslnego { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串指示发起方为匿名，但响应方证书可用作 SOAP SSL 协商的一部分。

span.span: Gets a string that indicates that the initiator is anonymous but the responder certificate is available as part of a SOAP SSL negotiation.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指示发起方为匿名，但响应方证书可用作 SOAP SSL 协商的一部分。

span.span: A string that indicates that the initiator is anonymous but the responder certificate is available as part of a SOAP SSL negotiation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property MutualSslnego As String
public: static property System::String ^ MutualSslnego { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串指示发起方和响应方使用 X.509 证书进行了相互验证。

span.span: Gets a string that indicates that the initiator and responder mutually authenticate each other using X.509 certificates.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指示发起方和响应方使用 X.509 证书进行了相互验证。

span.span: A string that indicates that the initiator and responder mutually authenticate each other using X.509 certificates.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 响应方的证书来自 SOAP SSL 协商。The responder's certificate is available from the SOAP SSL negotiation.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SecureConversation As String
public: static property System::String ^ SecureConversation { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串指示服务是否使用了 WS-SecureConversation 身份验证。

span.span: Gets a string that indicates whether the service uses WS-SecureConversation authentication.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指示服务是否使用了 WS-SecureConversation 身份验证。

span.span: A string that indicates whether the service uses WS-SecureConversation authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks WS-SecureConversation 规范建立在 WS-Security 和 WS-Policy 规范的基础之上。The WS-SecureConversation specification is built on the WS-Security and WS-Policy specifications. 它使各服务之间可以安全通信。It provides secure communication between services.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SecurityContext As String
public: static property System::String ^ SecurityContext { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串指示服务是否使用了 SOAP SecurityContext 身份验证。

span.span: Gets a string that indicates whether the service uses SOAP SecurityContext authentication.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指示服务是否使用了 SOAP SecurityContext 身份验证。

span.span: A string that indicates whether the service uses SOAP SecurityContext authentication.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此值指示 `SecurityContextToken` 用于表示可确保发送方和接收方对话安全的安全上下文。This value indicates that a `SecurityContextToken` is used to represent the security context that secures a conversation between a sender and a recipient.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Spnego As String
public: static property System::String ^ Spnego { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串指示身份验证是否是通过 Windows Services SP Negotiation (SPNEGO) 协议进行的。

span.span: Gets a string that indicates whether authentication is done via the Windows Services SP Negotiation (SPNEGO) protocol.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指示身份验证是否是通过 Windows Services SPNEGO 协议进行的。

span.span: A string that indicates whether authentication is done via the Windows Services SPNEGO protocol.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SPNEGO 是本机 Windows 到 Windows 的身份验证服务。SPNEGO is the native Windows-to-Windows authentication service.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property SspiCredential As String
public: static property System::String ^ SspiCredential { System::String ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取一个字符串，该字符串指示是否是通过 Windows 凭据进行客户端身份验证的。

span.span: Gets a string that indicates whether client authentication is by means of a Windows credential.

value.span: 一个字符串，该字符串指示是否是通过 Windows 凭据进行客户端身份验证的。

span.span: A string that indicates whether client authentication is by means of a Windows credential.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SSPI 允许应用程序使用计算机或网络上可用的各种安全模型，而无需改变安全系统的接口。SSPI allows an application to use various security models that are available on a computer or network without changing the interface to the security system.
